section.heading: Reports.
section.text: The Department of Employment Services shall submit quarterly reports, until January 1, 1997, on the effectiveness of outplacement services.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 5, 1996, D.C. Law 11-98, § 601, 43 DCR 5

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Merit system, effective date provisions, see § 1-636.02.
